name: LISTA FACTURACION
query:
SELECT
a.creation as "Fecha::100",
a.name as "Folio:Link/Sales Invoice:60",
a.customer as "Nombre Cliente:Link/Customer:500",
a.cfdi_status as "Estado::500",
a.total as "Subtotal::80", 
case when c.tax_amount is null then 0 else c.tax_amount end as "IVA::80", 
a.grand_total as "Total::80"
from `tabSales Invoice` a left join 
     `tabSales Invoice Item` b on a.name = b.parent left join 
     `tabSales Taxes and Charges` c on a.name = c.parent 
where a.posting_date >= %(a.from_date)s and a.posting_date <= %(a.to_date)s
order by a.creation desc
